data.title: Oak Hill High/Collins High School Alumni Association
data.text:
Welcome

The mission of the OHH/CHS Alumni Association is as follows:

To promote, organize, manage, support and fund alumni functions and meetings for Alumni of Oak Hill High/Collins High School and to promote and support Oak Hill High School, located at Oak Hill, Fayette County, West Virginia, and its various programs and activities.

To promote and encourage the pursuit of college or graduate school education in any field of study by Graduates of Oak Hill High School and to assist them financially and otherwise should there be need thereof, and to collect and to solicit funds for such purposes.

To support or establish facilities, programs and activities for the benefit and enjoyment of Oak Hill High School students and alumni.

To make financial contributions to provide other support to any group or organization which has its purpose or one of its purposes the improvement of Oak Hill High School.

Recent News

7/19/2024 OHHS/CHS Graduate Deaths

As the decades fly by, we find that more and more of our alumni are passing away, and as a service, we like to maintain a list that you can check on periodically. If you are aware of the death of an alumnus/alumna, please email to ohhsalumni@yahoo.com so we can read more »

3/14/2024 It's Time to Apply!

The application for the Red Devil Scholarships is up and running! The competition will probably be tough, so take time to do a quality job as you move through the application. Click the title to access it. Get busy. The final deadline is April 17. read more »

3/11/2024 Scholarship Applications Available Soon

Applications for the 2024-2025 Alumni Association scholarships should be available by the end of the day, March 15. Regardless of when they are published, the due date will be approximately four weeks later. For example, if they are published March 15, they will be due April 15. read more »

8/2/2023 2023 Newsletter Available Here

Read about plans for the 2023 Red Devil Dinner and Alumni party at Tamarack Conference Center September 1 as well as the opportunity to become an active donor with the association. Click on Downloads and the first four links are for the newsletter. Hope to hear from you. read more »

3/13/2023 2023-24 Red Devil Scholarship Application

Click the title above to access the scholarship application. Be sure to answer specifically; incomplete applications will not be considered. read more »

Read all news articles »
